definition: Yang Yuhuan 楊玉環|杨玉环[Yang2 Yu4 huan2] or Yang Guifei (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion 安史之亂|安史之乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]

sentences.english: Yang Guifei was a real national beauty.
Tang prepares a small feast for Yang in the imperial garden.
sentences.chinese: 唐明皇在御花園中爲楊貴妃設下小宴。

sentences.english: This site used to be the private baths for Yang Guifei, favorite concubine of the Tang emperor.
sentences.chinese: 您還可以到楊貴妃洗澡的華清池去洗溫泉澡。

sentences.english: Yang Guifei liked the sweet litchis very much.
sentences.chinese: 美味的荔枝深得楊貴妃的喜愛。

sentences.english: Without any other choice, Yang hangs herself on a pear tree.
sentences.chinese: 無奈之下，楊貴妃自縊於梨花樹下。

sentences.english: He once presented litchis from here as a tribute to Emperor Tang Xuanzong's concubine, Yang Guifei.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經把這裏的荔枝進貢給唐玄宗的妃子楊貴妃喫。

sentences.english: Concubine Yang was Emperor Xuanzong's favorite concubine in the Tang Dynasty and she was also one of Four Great Beauties in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 楊貴妃是唐玄宗皇帝的愛妃，也是中國四大美人之一。

sentences.english: The high-ranking Imperial Concubine Yang was a plump beauty in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 楊貴妃的體態充盈，是個唐代的美人。

sentences.english: Since Emperor Tang does not return to the palace, beauty Yang becomes angry and drinks her sorrows away.
sentences.chinese: 楊貴妃因唐明皇夜不回宮，心底生怨，借酒澆愁。

sentences.english: Women chubby beauty was adored in ancient Tang Dynasty in China, and the typical girl was Yang Guifei.
sentences.chinese: 中國唐朝崇尚豐膄婀娜之美，以楊貴妃爲典型。

sentences.english: Now many people are in doubt , it really is so beautiful legend?
sentences.chinese: 現在許多人都在懷疑，楊貴妃真有傳說中那麼美麼？

sentences.english: Yang Guifei , originally named Yang Yuhuan, was one of the Four Beauties in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 楊貴妃，小名玉環，中國古代四大美人之一。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the most famous beautiful lady was also a fat one, the royal concubine Yang.
sentences.chinese: 古代呢，最出名的美女還是大胖子，楊貴妃啊。

sentences.english: Their performances bedazzle those audiences, and it seems that beauty Yang and An Lushan have become the key figures.
sentences.chinese: 儼然楊貴妃和安祿山已變成了核心人物。

definition: Yang Yuhuan or Yang Guifei 楊貴妃|杨贵妃[Yang2 Gui4 fei1] (719-756), famous Tang beauty, consort of Emperor Xuanzhong 唐玄宗[Tang2 Xuan2 zong1], blamed for extravagance and killed as a scapegoat during the An-Shi Rebellion 安史之亂|安史之乱[An1 Shi3 zhi1 Luan4]
"sage of poetry", epithet of Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]
"immortal of poetry", epithet of Li Bai 李白[Li3 Bai2]

Diaochan (-192), one of the four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], in fiction a famous beauty at the break-up of Han dynasty, given as concubine to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo 董卓[Dong3 Zhuo2] to ensure his overthrow by fighting hero Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4]
alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to write for sb else/a lawyer who writes legal documents for his clients
Tale of the White Snake/Madame White Snake
